alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 03 at 10:23AM CDT until September 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High waves up to 7 feet and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. * WHERE...Lake IL, Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM CDT this evening through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. For information on swim advisories or bans at Chicago beaches: www. cpdbeaches. com.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
